Shockwave/Ramhorn:

Shockwave brought up his targeting scanners.  "This should make the emotional 
fools aware of their impending downfall." he mused, activating two missiles.  
Flying by at mach 3, firing two missiles at the Ark as he flew by, continuing 
to speed.

----

Ramhorn felt the Ark shake slightl.  "What the slag was that?!" he yelled, 
running towards the bridge.
